title: Coding and Finnish language
text: Programming and Finnish language course helped me to improve my skills and gain real life work experience.

title: Python Programming Course
text: Fundamentals of Python programming, including data types, variables, control structures, functions, and modules. The course provided a strong foundation for further learning and development in the Python language.

title: Courses in React, Agile and GIT
text: Helped me gain a deeper understanding of front-end web development and the tools used in the industry. The hands-on projects in the courses helped me solidify my skills in React, HTML, CSS, Agile methodology, and GIT version control.
